persistanceController

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistanceController.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Data Manager class. It servers as as API for the save/Load functionality of the app. It uses the following design patterns: Facade: It provides the user with a simple save/load API that hides the complexity of the code. Singleton: Static method with static calls.
    Author:
    eorod_000
